title: Service User
description: Service User of the planning inspectorate. Also contains role information by combining serviceUserType and caseReference.

id.description: A unique identifier for the entity.

salutation.description: A formal greeting, e.g., Mr, Mrs, Ms.

firstName.description: The first name of the individual.

lastName.description: The last name of the individual.

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address.

addressLine2.description: The second line of the address, usually includes suite or apartment number.

addressTown.description: The town or city of the address.

addressCounty.description: The county in which the town or city is located.

postcode.description: The postal code for the address.

organisation.description: The name of the organisation associated with the individual.

organisationType.description: The type or nature of the organisation.

role.description: The individual's role or position within the organisation.

otherPhoneNumber.description: An alternate or secondary phone number.

emailAddress.description: The primary email address for contact.

serviceUserType.description: Type or category of the service user.

caseReference.description: Reference number for a particular case or incident.

sourceSystem.description: The originating system from where the data was sourced.

sourceSuid.description: Unique identifier from the source system.
